investPropensity.title: Investment Propensity Diagnosis
investPropensity.description: We will guide you to products suitable for your investment propensity and objectives.

question1.questionText: What is the investment period for the funds you intend to invest?

question2.questionText: What do you consider your level of experience with financial products?
question2.option1: [Very low level] No experience investing in financial products
question2.option2: [Low level] Some understanding of the structure and risks of well-known financial products (stocks, bonds, and funds)
question2.option3: [High level] Able to distinguish between most financial products available for investment
question2.option4: [Very high level] Understands the differences across all investment products, including financial products

question3.questionText: What proportion of your total financial assets (excluding real estate) does the current investment capital represent?

question4.questionText: What level of returns do you expect from your current investment capital and what level of loss can you tolerate?
question4.option1: Willing to take risks if the expected returns are high
question4.option2: Can tolerate losses up to 20% if expected returns are met
question4.option3: Can tolerate losses up to 10% if a certain level of returns is expected
question4.option4: The investment principal must be preserved regardless of circumstances

question5.questionText: Which of the following most closely matches your investment experience? (Multiple selections possible)
question5.option1: Conservative products - bank deposits/savings, government bonds, municipal bonds, guaranteed bonds, MMF, CMA, etc.
question5.option2: Safety-seeking products - financial bonds, high-credit corporate bonds, bond funds, principal-protected ELS, etc.
question5.option3: Risk-neutral products - mid-credit corporate bonds, partially principal-protected ELS, mixed funds, etc.
question5.option4: Aggressive investment products - low-credit corporate bonds, stocks, non-principal-protected ELS, equity funds targeting market returns, etc.
question5.option5: Highly aggressive investment products - ELW, futures options, equity funds seeking above-market returns, funds investing in derivatives, margin trading, etc.

agree.title: Personal (Credit) Information Collection and Use Consent Form (For Financial Transactions)
agree.introduction: Eagle Five Brothers Co., Ltd. adheres to the 'Personal Information Protection Law', 'Credit Information Use and Protection Law', and other related legal regulations to inform you of the following matters and seek your consent.

infoCollectionUse.purpose:
■ Conclusion, maintenance, performance, management, and improvement of (financial) contracts
■ Compliance with legal obligations (real-name verification, specific financial transaction reporting, unfair trade prevention, suitability verification, reporting of overseas tax obligations, etc.)
■ Financial accident prevention (identity verification, detection of unusual financial transactions, etc.), dispute and complaint handling, accident investigation
■ Statistics, risk management, and improvement of customer service quality
infoCollectionUse.items:
■ Personal identification information: Name, unique identification information (including birthdate and gender for foreigners), address, contact information, occupation, nationality, CI, email
■ Transaction medium-related information: ID, type of medium, IP address, MAC address, and other medium identification information, access medium information, etc.
■ Customer verification information (CDD/EDD): Transaction purpose, expected transactions, information on agents/clients and other special relationships, etc.
■ Financial transaction information: Type of products and services, transaction conditions/timing/amount, and other transaction setup details, etc.
■ In case of agents: Name, unique identification information (including birthdate and gender for foreigners), occupation, nationality, contact information, relationship with the principal, etc.
■ Overseas tax obligation information
■ US FATCA: English name, English address, US taxpayer number, US citizenship status (citizen, permanent resident, tax resident)
■ UN CRS: English name, English address, tax obligation country (excluding the US), (optional) taxpayer number
infoCollectionUse.retentionPeriod: Five years from the date of transaction termination (however, for financial accident investigation, dispute resolution, complaint handling, compliance with Capital Market Law (over 10 years), etc., it is stored separately)

infoInquiryDetails.consentStatement:
※ Records of our company inquiring your personal credit information through a credit information center or credit inquiry company may be provided to other financial institutions, and may result in a decrease in your credit rating.
I agree to inquire my personal credit information as follows.
infoInquiryDetails.agency: ■ Credit Information Center (Credit Information Institute), Credit Inquiry Company (NICE Evaluation Information)
infoInquiryDetails.purpose: ■ Maintenance and post-management of the contract (including transaction information prior to this contract), decision on whether to set up financial transactions such as loans and credit cards, development and analysis of credit-related statistical models, personal requests, and other financial transaction-related tasks
infoInquiryDetails.content: ■ Personal identification information, credit transaction information, delinquency and other debt non-performance information, occupational and property-related credit capability information, public institution-held information, credit rating and score, other institution's credit information inquiry records, personal authentication information, etc.
infoInquiryDetails.validityPeriod: ■ The consent remains valid until the termination of this contract and remains valid even if changes occur due to contract renewal, etc., but is only valid until the point if the financial transaction I applied for is rejected by your company. However, if there is credit transaction information existing before this contract, it remains valid until the termination of the existing contract

uniqueIdHandlingDetails.purpose: ■ For credit agreement contracts, credit information inquiry and provision, etc., conclusion, maintenance, performance, management, and improvement of product contracts, personal verification, compliance with legal obligations, financial accident investigation, dispute and complaint handling
uniqueIdHandlingDetails.items: ■ Social security number, passport number, driver's license number, foreign registration number, domestic residence reporting number
uniqueIdHandlingDetails.remark: ■ The recipient and (the recipient's) retention and use period are the same as stated in the collection and use consent form

additionalInfo.understanding: ※ I have fully understood the contents of the customer rights information regarding (credit) information collection, use, and provision.
additionalInfo.refusalConsequences:
Instructions for refusing consent:
You have the right to refuse consent for the collection and use of personal (credit) information. However, since this consent is essential for account opening or product contracts, conclusion, and performance, refusing consent will make it impossible to open accounts or conclude and perform product contracts.
additionalInfo.privacyPolicy: ※ The personal information processing policy (or disclosure of the credit information system) is disclosed through our company's internet homepage, so you can check the details on the homepage.
additionalInfo.minorPolicy: ※ If the customer is under 14 years old, only a legal representative (such as parents, guardians) can consent.
additionalInfo.agentPolicy: ※ If the consenter is an agent, unless the principal has explicitly delegated the consent of the selection consent form to the agent, the agent can only consent to the principal's essential consent form.
additionalInfo.terminationDate: ※ The transaction termination date mentioned in this consent form refers to the point when all accounts held by the customer are actively closed and all contracts for products are terminated.
additionalInfo.accountDeletion: ※ If account opening is not completed within 7 days, all information collected during the account opening process will be deleted.
